products.title: Orient Faux Silk Indigo Blue Roman Blind
products.description: Their orient faux-silk roman blinds are carefully made, look beautiful when fitted, and are light and durable. This indigo blue faux-silk roman blind, introduces a medium blue shade to your window, and looks fabulous either with matching or contrasting accessories. Add a touch of luxury to your home with their hand-made roman blinds. At swift direct blinds, quality is important to us, which is why not only is this roman hand-made by an expert team, but it also comes with a free five year warranty, for extra peace of mind.

products.title: Zumba Indigo Roman Blind
products.description: Enjoy a bold summertime vibe with the zumba indigo roman blind. Teaming smooth functionality and a lively dance of zesty colours, this 70s inspired roman blind is printed on 100% cotton and will prove a light and uplifting addition to your interior, whether your style is modern retro or country chic. Product id: db-rom1078 fabric colour: indigo material: 100% cotton lining: light filtering poly/cotton blended lining headrail: durable white headrail with top or face fix brackets.

products.description: Their shoal range is a fishy pattern available in two stunning shades. products.title: Azurite Chenille Indigo Blue Roman Blind
products.description: Their azurite chenille range consists of textured plains with a velour soft-feel finish. This soft dark blue roman blind fuses a plush, luxuy feel in a contemporary blue tone to create a on trend room feature that is bound to be noticed. At swift direct blinds, quality is important to us, which is why this roman comes with their free five year guarantee and customer-first service. Available as a matching curtain.

products.title: Kingsley Heather Purple Roman Blind
products.description: The kingsley roman blind in heather offers a subdued accent to dark and light rooms alike. Imagine this against grey paintwork, offsetting navy walls or accenting white or pastels. Weve created this from a fabric that is suited to any room because we know, that with such a versatile design you could as easily want this in your bathroom as you would your lounge. Product id: db-rom1111 fabric colour: heather purple material: 60% cotton 40% polyester lining: light filtering poly/cotton blended lining headrail: durable white headrail with top or face fix brackets.

products.title: Brookstone Heather Purple Roman Blind
products.description: The modern geometric shapes on the brookstone roman blind in heather purple can be adapted to particular places. This rich looking fabric will look stunny when paired with dark woods. Use in dining rooms or living rooms to give a stately finish, or to a kitchen to balance the contrasting colours. Made from the optimal blend of cotton fabrics, youll be certain your choice will be suitable for every room and function.
